component.name: ConfClerk
component.summary: ConfClerk is an application written in ​Qt, which makes conference schedules available offline. It displays the conference schedule from various views, supports searches on various items (speaker, speech topic, location, etc.) and enables you to select favorite events and create your own schedule

description.p: At the moment ConfClerk is able to import schedules in XML format created by the ​PentaBarf conference management system (or ​frab) used by ​FOSDEM, ​DebConf, ​Grazer Linuxtage, the ​CCC congresses, ​FrOSCon, and ​many others.
ConfClerk is targetted at mobile devices like the Nokia N810 and N900 but works on any system running ​Qt.
